Plot: In 18th century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his native American friend Mani are sent by the King to the Gevaudan province to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.
Title: Brotherhood of the Wolf
Writer: Stéphane Cabel (original scenario), Stéphane Cabel (adaptation), Christophe Gans (adaptation)
Actors: Samuel Le Bihan, Mark Dacascos, Jérémie Renier, Vincent Cassel
tomatoConsensus: Brotherhood of the Wolf mixes its genres with little logic, but the end result is wildly entertaining.
